info.author: Tetrad Implemented by Peter Schaldenbrand pschalde@cs.cmu.edu
info.abstract:
The regression box takes as input a data set and performs either multiple linear regression or logistic regression.
Tetrad Website
info.outputs:
tetrad-graph - A graph made up of the relationships/edges that the regression algorithm determined were significant.
tetrad-regression - Various details about the output of the regression algorithm.
